resources.string: Carla Betker,M.Ed has worked as a school psychologist in Manitoba schools for over 20 years.She has also worked as a therapist in a clinical treatment seeting for adolescents, and has a private practice where she provides counselling services to children, adolescents and adults; as well as parent coaching to parents with children of all ages.
I\'ll do my beat to get back to you in a timely manner.
Do you have a question or concern?
